The Legacy of Elizabeth Taylor's White Diamonds

Launched in 1991, White Diamonds was Elizabeth Taylor's passionate project and quickly became one of the most successful celebrity fragrances ever created. The iconic actress, known for her love of actual diamonds, created this scent to capture the sparkling elegance and timeless beauty of her favorite jewels. Three decades later, this luxurious body powder continues her legacy of glamour and sophistication. ðŸ’«

Frequently Asked Question

How should I apply White Diamonds Body Powder for the best effect?

For optimal results, apply White Diamonds Body Powder after bathing to slightly damp skin using the included powder puff. Focus on pulse points and areas that tend to perspire for both fragrance enhancement and moisture absorption. For a more intense scent experience, layer with matching fragrance products from the White Diamonds collection, applying the powder as your final step to set and extend your signature scent.
